Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

currentTime(accessor,null) : prime.bindable.Bindable<Float>

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
Number of seconds the stream has been playing. This value is automaticly updated, as long as the stream is playing. The first time the time is called, the stream will start a timer to update the value (every 200ms). Note: To seek the in the stream, you should not change this property but use the "seek" method.

next(default,null) : BaseMediaStream

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
Property only used by SoundMixer. Identical as ListNode, accept that SoundMixer can change the value.

repeat : Int

the number of times to repeat the audio-file. -1 means continues looping.

repeated(default,null) : Int

Number of times the file has already repeated itself.

source : prime.avm2.media.Sound

state(default,null) : prime.fsm.SimpleStateMachine<prime.fsm.states.MediaStates>

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
Current state of the media-stream. Do not modify the state directly, but use the appropriate methods to change the state of mediastream.

totalTime(default,null) : prime.bindable.Bindable<Float>

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
Bindable value with the total-time of the stream (in sec.).

url(default,null) : prime.bindable.Bindable<prime.types.URI>

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
URL of the video-stream.

volume(default,null) : prime.bindable.Bindable<Float>

inherited from prime.media.BaseMediaStream
audio-volume of the media-stream. 0 =< value <= 1
